title: Reise ins Ausland
translation: Sabine wants to travel abroad. She has never been abroad. The foreigner at the train station talks to Sabine. He speaks a foreign language. Sabine turns off the light in the room and leaves. She hears the announcement on the radio about the trip. In the morning, Sabine looks in the mirror and finds her appearance is good. The light is now off, everything is quiet. At the train station, Sabine gets out of the car. She shows her ID at the check. Then she takes off her jacket. She buys a ticket at the machine. The door opens automatically. In the waiting room sits a baby with its mother. Sabine is hungry and goes to the bakery. She buys a roll and a banana. Then she sits on the balcony and eats everything. Later, she goes to the bank and gets cash.
